attributes.action: All cyclists over 16 to be insured to ride on the road
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst some cyclists will ride sensibly and follow the rules of the road, there are some who believe that the rules do not apply to them. 

Having a clear way to identify them, may encourage more of them to ride sensibly. Cyclists should have to purchase insurance. A high visibility jacket with a number on it should have to be worn. This way if they hit you, ride through red lights or something else, there is a way that they can be identified and held accountable.
attributes.background: Make it law that all cyclists should have to purchase insurance and wear a high visibility jacket with a number to identify them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633708
